Dialogue.Page: This is good weather for your launch, right? That’s lucky!

DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Moraine. Have you perhaps heard.. a harmonica anywhere with your signalscope?
Any good sounds from space today?

Dialogue.Page: Um, harmonica.. As in Feldspar's harmonica? I'd have run and told Gneiss if I heard it!
Maybe you should get out your signalscope and see if you hear anything instead? I heard Slate beefed up the newest signalscope so it can hear even farther than ever.
I can only hear Riebeck and Chert playing with my signalscope. Can't even hear signals passing through Timber Hearth these days, after Tephra and Galena dropped it..
I'm gonna be extra good so I can ask Slate for a new, stronger signalscope for my birthday this year.

DialogueOption.Text: Hey, I was wondering. Have you heard a harmonica anywhere with your signalscope?
Haven’t you been up in this tree a while?
Any good sounds from space today?

Dialogue.Page: I’m using my signalscope to pick up sounds from distant planets.
It’s set to the Outer Wilds Ventures frequency so I can pick up the travelers’ music.
There are! My signalscope is set to the Outer Wilds Ventures frequency, so I’m listening to the travelers’ music.
Last night I heard Riebeck’s banjo coming from Brittle Hollow. I hope that means they’re safe.
I can hear different planets, too! It depends on what time of day or night it is, since different planets are in the sky at different times.
I’m concerned Marl will cut down this tree if there’s no one in it, so I don’t want to leave it for too long.
Mayor Rutile says Marl isn’t supposed to cut it down, but I don’t think they see eyes-to-eyes on this one.
Um, I’ll still watch your launch, though! I’ll have a good view from up here.
